name: RAM RMA
description:
A simple platform/shooter with art by @pomerane.

Includes three short levels, introducing some basic platforming, switches and doors, as well as a couple enemy types.

Let us know what you think! We had a lot of fun making this for My First Game Jam: Winter 2018 and would like to continue this project.

Ouroboros Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
